Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) are of great interest nowadays.
Titulo: The hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) systems steady state modeling

Sentencas: The feature of SOFCs makes them suitable for hybrid systems because they work high operating temperature and when combined with conventional turbine power plants offer high cycle efficiencies.
Titulo: The hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) systems steady state modeling

Sentencas: In this work a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine power system model is developed.
Titulo: The hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) systems steady state modeling

Sentencas: Two models have been developed based on simple thermodynamic expressions.
Titulo: The hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) systems steady state modeling

Sentencas: The simple models are used in the preliminary part of the study and a more realistic based on the performance maps.
Titulo: The hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) systems steady state modeling

Sentencas: A comparative study of the simulated configurations, based on an energy analysis is used to perform a parametric study of the overall hybrid system efficiency.
Titulo: The hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) systems steady state modeling

Sentencas: Some important observations are made by means of a sensitivity study of the whole cycle for the selected configuration.
Titulo: The hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) systems steady state modeling

Sentencas: The results of the selected model were compared to an earlier model from an available literature.
Titulo: The hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) systems steady state modeling
